name: Fight-Pot
description:
“Hey! That’s not supposed to be there!”

You’ve come to hot pot and you’re hangry! There’s only one pot, so you and your friend need to fight to get your order in! Throw food into the pot to complete your order or at your enemies to cause chaos! 

Fling food, fill up, and fight others! What are you waiting for?

INSTRUCTIONS

Fight-Pot is a competitive online cooking game, where you fight the opposing team to clear YOUR orders as fast as possible. 

2 teams will compete to fill out their orders by adding ingredients into the pot and sending them out.

  • WASD/Arrow Keys to walk
  • LMB to pick up and throw ingredients

When you have enough ingredients in the pot, hit the button to send it out to complete the order! Make sure the order is filled or you’ll send out the wrong order and waste time.

The other team will be trying to do the same thing but there isn’t enough space in the pot. If a 6th ingredient is added to the pot, the 1st ingredient will pop out!

You can stop the other team by throwing food at them! Each food type has a different effect on the target.

  • Veggies invert controls
  • Starches paralyze
  • Meat shoves the targe

MADE FOR TOJAM 2022 ALL TWOGETHER NOW
